name: Nelke & the LA: 37 Costume Pack
detailed_description:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass "Legendary Town Building Set". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

A costume set provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass.

Outfits of characters that appear in events will be changed to "New Year Costumes".

Note: Costumes can be changed from Extra - Character Book.
Note: These costumes do not apply to character models.
Note: Some costumes are automatically changed into during specific scenes.

short_description: A costume set provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass. Outfits of characters that appear in events will be changed to "New Year Costumes".

fullgame.name: Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists ~Ateliers of the New World~ / ネルケと伝説の錬金術士たち ～新たな大地のアトリエ～

supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
